text: Mark Anthony Selby (born 19 June 1983, Leicester, England) is an English professional snooker and pool player. Selby has won the World Championship, UK Championship, the Masters, the Welsh Open, and the Shanghai Masters.World rankings ==Career finals== ===Ranking event finals: 7 (2 title, 5 runner- ups)=== Legend World Championship (0–1) UK Championship (0–0) Other (2–4) Outcome No. Year Championship Opponent in the final Score Runner-up 1. 2003 Scottish Open 7–9 Runner-up 2. 2007 World Snooker Championship 13–18 Winner 1. 2008 Welsh Open 9–8 Runner-up 3. 2011 German Masters 7–9 Runner-up 4. 2011 China Open 8–10 Winner 2. 2011 Shanghai Masters 10–9 Runner-up 5. 2012 Welsh Open Ding Junhui 6–9 ===Minor-ranking finals: 2 (2 titles)=== Outcome No. Year Championship Opponent in the final Score Winner 1. 2010 Players Tour Championship – Event 2 4–3 Winner 2. 2011 Paul Hunter Classic 4–0 ===Non- ranking event finals: 9 (3 titles, 6 runner-ups)=== Legend Masters (2–1) Premier League (0–1) Other (1–4) Outcome No. Year Championship Opponent in the final Score Runner-up 1. 2006 Masters Qualifying Event 2–6 Winner 1. 2008 Masters 10–3 Runner-up 2. 2008 Championship League 1–3 Runner-up 3. 2008 Jiangsu Classic Ding Junhui 5–6 Runner-up 4. 2008 Premier League Snooker 2–7 Runner-up 5. 2009 Masters 8–10 Runner-up 6. 2009 Championship League (2) 2–3 Winner 2. 2010 Masters (2) 10–9 Winner 3. 2011 Wuxi Classic 9–7 ===Pro-am tournaments=== * Warsaw Snooker Tour – 2007 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Leicester Category:English snooker players
